tool_description: Calculates key performance indicators and metrics from return data including return rates, processing times, and refund amounts.

return_ids.description: List of return transaction IDs to analyze

calculation_period.description: Time period for metric calculation: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly

include_financial_metrics.description: Whether to include financial impact calculations

include_processing_metrics.description: Whether to include processing time metrics

benchmark_period.description: Previous period for comparison: same_period_last_year, previous_period

error_messages: Empty return data: No valid return records found for the provided return_ids
Invalid calculation period: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly]
Invalid benchmark period: Use one of [same_period_last_year, previous_period]
Insufficient data for comparison: Not enough historical data available for the selected benchmark period
usage: Provide return_ids and calculation_period to compute return metrics. Optionally enable/disable financial and processing metrics and set benchmark_period for comparisons.

return_rate.description: Overall return rate as a percentage

average_processing_time.description: Average return processing time in hours
